p: Samples (∼10 g) were collected from the quail cecum (5 samples per treatment) at the end of experiment and were transferred to a 250 mL Erlenmeyer flask containing 90 mL of peptone (0.1% peptone) in a saline solution (0.85% NaCl) and were thoroughly mixed. The total bacterial count, Enterobacter spp. count, total count of molds and yeasts, Salmonella spp. count, Coliform, lactic acid bacteria count, and E. coli count were estimated according to Xia et al. (2004) and Reda et al. (2020a, b).
